title: Shooting in US: One killed during opening of Nipsey Hussle's Marathon Burger
summary_full: A deadly shooting occurred during the grand opening of Marathon Burger, a restaurant co-founded by the late rapper Nipsey Hussle. The incident, reported on Pine Avenue, resulted in one fatality and two individuals sustaining injuries. Police are actively investigating the shooting, with no suspect or motive yet announced.
